name: Flowered Up
description: '''Flowered Up''' were an English [[indie pop]]-[[alternative dance]] band, formed in [[Camden Town]], London, in 1989, active during the [[baggy]] movement.  Their 13-minute single "[[Weekender (Flowered Up song)|Weekender]]" reached the UK top 20. The band split up in 1994 amid drug problems. Following a failed reformation attempt in 2007 and a solo record deal that fell through, frontman Liam Maher died from a heroin overdose in 2009, followed by his brother Joe from complications of long-term ill-health, in 2012.
